home.description: I’m a Software Engineering Co-op student at Concordia University with an interest in the latest web development technologies and programming. Experienced in full-stack development using the MERN stack and Java, I’m excited to continuously learn and explore new technologies to expand my skill set.

paperTrading.title: MERN Full Stack Paper Trading Platform (Personal) 2024
paperTrading.description: Co-developed a paper trading platform simulating U.S. equities trading with real-time market data.

petAdoption.title: Full Stack Pet Adoption Service (Academic) 2024
petAdoption.description: Created a web application for a pet adoption service, allowing users to register and manage pet listings.

marketForecaster.title: Machine Learning Market Forecaster (Personal) 2024
marketForecaster.description: Developed a tool predicting Bitcoin and S&P 500 prices using machine learning models based on historical data.

othelloGame.title: Java Othello Game (Academic) 2024
othelloGame.description: Built a fully functional Othello game in Java, implementing core mechanics and object-oriented design.
